name: Militia
note: Basic infantry swordsman. Quick and cheap to create.

civb.Goths: Cost starting feudal 39F 13G, +1 attack against buildings
civb.Vikings: 44 HP in Feudal, 46 HP in Castle, 48 HP in Imperial Age
civb.Malians: +1 PA/age -> (2 in Feudal, 3 in Castle and 4 in Imperial Age)

name: Man-at-arms
note: Stronger than Militia. Attack bonus vs. buildings.

civb.Vikings: 50 HP in Feudal, 52 HP in Castle, 54 HP in Imperial Age
civb.Malians: +1 PA/age -> (2 in Feudal, 3 in Castle and 4 in Imperial Age)

name: Long Swordsman
note: Stronger than Man-at-Arms. Attack bonus vs. buildings.

civb.Vikings: 69 HP in Castle, 72 HP in Imperial Age
civb.Malians: +1 PA/age -> (3 in Castle and 4 in Imperial Age)

name: Two-handed Swordsman
note: Stronger than Long Swordsman. Attack bonus vs. buildings.

civb.Vikings: 72 HP in Imperial Age

name: Champion
note: Stronger than Two-Handed Swordsman.

civb.Vikings: 84 HP in Imperial Age

name: Spearman

extra.attack bonus: +1 eagles, +1 buildings, +15 war elephants, +15 cavalry, +12 camels, +9 vs ships

civb.Vikings: 50 HP in Feudal, 52 HP in Castle, 54 HP in Imperial Age
civb.Malians: +1 PA/age -> (1 in Feudal, 2 in Castle and 3 in Imperial Age)

note: Medium infantry. Since war elephants are also cavalry, the attack bonus is +30

name: Pikeman

extra.attack bonus: +1 eagles, +1 buildings, +25 war elephants, +22 cavalry, +18 camels, +16 ships

civb.Vikings: 63 HP in Castle, 66 HP in Imperial Age
civb.Malians: +1 PA/age -> (1 in Feudal, 2 in Castle and 3 in Imperial Age)

note: Stronger than Spearman. Since war elephants are also cavalry, the attack bonus is +47

name: Halberdier

extra.attack bonus: +1 eagles, +1 buildings, +28 war elephants, +32 cavalry, +26 camels, +17 vs ships

civb.Vikings: 72 HP in Imperial Age
civb.Malians: +1 PA/age -> (1 in Feudal, 2 in Castle and 3 in Imperial Age)

note: Stronger than Pikeman. Since war elephants are also cavalry, the attack bonus is +60

name: Eagle Warrior
note: Fast infantry with extensive sight; resists conversion; attack bonus vs. Monks

name: Elite Eagle Warrior
note: Stronger than Eagle Warrior.

name: Archer

civb.Briton: 5 RA 8 LOS from Castle 6 RA 9 LOS from Imperial Age
civb.Mayans: Cost 23W 41G in Feudal, 20W 36G in Castle, 18W 32G in Imperial Age
civb.Vietnamese: 33 HP in Feudal (10%), 35 HP in Castle (15%) and 36 HP in Imperial Age (20%)

note: Quick and light. Weak at close range; excels at battle from distance.

name: Crossbowman

civb.Briton: 5 RA 8 LOS from Castle 6 RA 9 LOS from Imperial Age
civb.Mayans: Cost 23W 41G in Feudal, 20W 36G in Castle, 18W 32G in Imperial Age
civb.Vietnamese: 40 HP in Castle (15%) and 42 HP in Imperial Age (20%)

note: Stronger than archer

name: Arbalest

civb.Briton: 5 RA 8 LOS from Castle 6 RA 9 LOS from Imperial Age
civb.Mayans: Cost 23W 41G in Feudal, 20W 36G in Castle, 18W 32G in Imperial Age

note: Stronger than crossbowman

name: Cavalry Archer

civb.Huns: Costs 36W 54G in Castle age (-10% bonus), 32W 48G in Imperial(-20% bonus)
civb.Vietnamese: 58 HP in Castle (15%) and 60 HP in Imperial Age (20%)

note: Fast, with ranged attack. Ideal for hit-and-run attacks.

name: Heavy Cavalry Archer
note: Stronger than Cavalry Archer.

name: Hand Cannoneer
note: Powerful close attack; inaccurate at range. Attack bonus against spearman +11 in total

name: Skirmisher
note: Ranged unit equipped with armor vs. archer attacks.

name: Elite Skirmisher

extra.attack bonus: +3 spearmen, +4 archers/hand cannon/skirms/conquistadors, +2 against cavalry archers

note: Stronger than skirmisher; Attack bonus against cavalry archers +6 in total (+4 against archers + 2 against cav archers).

name: Scout Cavalry

civb.Berbers: Cost 68F in Castle Age and 64F in Imperial Age (-15/20% respectively

note: Fast with extensive line of sight. Resistant to conversion +2 LOS per age

name: Light Cavalry

civb.Berbers: Cost 68F in Castle Age and 64F in Imperial Age (-15/20% respectively

note: Stronger than scout cavalry +2 LOS per age

name: Hussar

civb.Berbers: Cost 68F in Castle Age and 64F in Imperial Age (-15/20% respectively

note: Stronger than light cavalry +2 LOS per age

name: Knight

civb.Berbers: Costs 51F 64G in Castle age (-15% cost), 48F 60G (-20% cost) in Imperial Age

note: Fast and heavy cavalry.

name: Cavalier

civb.Berbers: Costs 51F 64G in Castle age (-15% cost), 48F 60G (-20% cost) in Imperial Age

note: Stronger than knight

name: Paladin
note: Stronger than cavalier

name: Camel

civb.Berbers: Costs 47F 51G in Castle age (-15% cost), 44F 48G (-20% cost) in Imperial Age

note: Excels at killing other mounted units. (not classified as cavalry)

name: Heavy Camel

civb.Berbers: Costs 47F 51G in Castle age (-15% cost), 44F 48G (-20% cost) in Imperial Age

note: Stronger than Camel. Attack bonus vs. cavalry. (not classified as cavalry)

name: Mangonel
note: Wheeled siege weapon used to attack a small mass of units. Area of effect attack. Can attack ground. Weak vs. close nonranged units.

name: Onager
note: Stronger than mangonel. Can kill trees

name: Siege Onager
note: Stronger than onager

name: Scorpion
note: damage to all units in the path

name: Heavy Scorpion
note: damage to all units in the path

name: Battering Ram

extra.attack bonus: +125 (+165 full) buildings, +40 siege, +150 (+190 full) with siege engineers buildings

note: Slow, lumbering siege weapon used to reduce enemy towns to ruins. The movement rate is affected by the number of infantry units garrisoned (maxiumum of 4 units)

name: Capped Ram

extra.attack bonus: +150 (+200 full) buildings, +50 siege, +180 (+230 full) with siege engineers buildings

note: Stronger than battering ram. Can garrison 5 units. The movement rate is affected by the number of infantry units garrisoned, max speed at 0.75.

name: Siege Ram

extra.attack bonus: +200 (+260 full) buildings, +65 siege, +240 (+300 full) with siege engineers buildings

note: Stronger than capped ram. The movement rate is affected by the number of infantry units garrisoned (maxiumum of 6 units garrisoned)

name: Bombard Cannon
note: Powerful mobile anti-building siege weapon.

name: Trebuchet
note: Powerful siege weapon used to destroy buildings, walls from long distance. Cannot fire on close units. Must be packed to move, unpacked to attack. Can cut paths through forests. Unpack time: 0:11

name: Petard
note: Demolition infantry unit armed with explosives. Bonuses add up - for example against walls and gates: +500 buildings +900 walls = +1400 bonus attack.

name: Berserk

civb.Vikings: base HP 54, but thanks to viking bonus HP in castle age: 61 in Imperial: 64

note: Viking unique unit. Infantry that slowly heals itself.

name: Elite Berserk

civb.Vikings: base HP 62, but thanks to viking bonus HP in Imperial: 75

note: Viking unique unit. Stronger than Berserk.

name: Cataphract
note: Byzantine unique unit. Heavily armored cavalry.

name: Elite Cataphract
note: Byzantine elite unique unit. Heavily armored cavalry.

name: Chu Ko Nu

extra.reload time: 3, but the multiple missiles for some reason cause roughly 0.6 delay

civb.Saracen ally: +2 attack against buildings for first arrow

note: Chinese unique unit. Archer with mediocre range. Shoots a volley of 2 extra arrows with 3 attack.  Because of the multiple arrows, the delay between starts of attacks is more, roughly 3.6.

name: Elite Chu Ko Nu

extra.reload time: 3, but the multiple missiles for some reason cause roughly 0.75 delay

civb.Saracen ally: +2 attack against buildings for first arrow

note: Chinese unique unit. Stronger than Chu Ko Nu. Shoots a volley of 4 extra arrows with 3 attack. Because of the multiple arrows, the delay between starts of attacks is more, roughly 3.75.

name: Conquistador
note: Spanish unique unit. Mounted Hand Cannoneer. Powerful close attack, but inaccurate at range. (Only archer armor upgrades apply from blacksmith, not range or attack).

name: Elite Conquistador
note: Spanish elite unique unit. Mounted Hand Cannoneer. Powerful close attack, but inaccurate at range. (Only archer armor upgrades apply from blacksmith, not range or attack).

name: Huskarl

civb.Goths: +1 against buildings, making it +3; base cost 80F 40G; 0:13.33BT from barracks

note: Gothic unique unit. Infantry with substantial pierce armor; virtually immune to archer fire. Attack bonus vs. buildings, archers.

name: Elite Huskarl

civb.Goths: +1 against buildings (making it +4); base cost 80F 40G; 0:13.33BT from barracks

note: Gothic elite unique unit. Stronger than Huskarl.

name: Jaguar Warrior

civb.Aztec: base BT 20, but with aztec bonus 20*0.85 = 17 seconds

note: Aztec unique unit. Attack bonus vs. other infantry. (bonus attacks stack so +12 bonus against eagles)

name: Elite Jaguar Warrior

civb.Aztec: base BT 20, but with aztec bonus 20*0.85 = 17 seconds

note: Aztec elite unique unit. Attack bonus vs. other infantry. (bonus attacks stack so +13 bonus against eagles)

name: Janissary

civb.Turks:
base creation time 21 seconds, but the -20% bonus makes it 0:17;
Base HP 35, but 25% HP bonus -> 44 HP

note: Turkish unique unit. Hand Cannoneer with longer range and no minimum range.

name: Elite Janissary

civb.Turks:
base creation time 21 seconds, but the -20% bonus makes it 0:17;
Base HP 40, but 25% HP bonus -> 50 HP

note: Turkish elite unique unit. Hand Cannoneer with longer range and no minimum range.

name: Longbowman

civb.Britons: base 5 RA 7 LOS, with bonus 6 RA 8 LOS in Castle 7 RA 9 LOS in Imperial

note: British unique unit. Powerful archer with long range.

name: Elite Longbowman

civb.Britons: base 6 RA 8 LOS, with bonus 8 RA 10 LOS in Imperial

note: British unique unit. Powerful archer with long range.

name: Mameluke
note: Saracen unique unit. Camel with hand-to-hand attack at distance. Excels vs. other mounted units.

name: Elite Mameluke
note: Saracen elite unique unit. Camel with hand-to-hand attack at distance. Excels vs. other mounted units.

name: Mangudai

civb.Mongols: Base reload time 2.1, but -20% reload time with mongols

note: Mongol unique unit. Cavalry archer with attack bonus vs. siege weapons.

name: Elite Mangudai

civb.Mongols: Base reload time 2.1, but -20% reload time with mongols

note: Mongol elite unique unit. Cavalry archer with attack bonus vs. siege weapons

name: Plumed Archer

civb.Mayans: Base cost 50W 50G -> 40W 40G in Castle, 35W 35G in Imperial age

note: Mayan unique unit. Strong, fast, well-armored archer with less attack than other archers.

name: Elite Plumed Archer
note: Mayan elite unique unit. Strong, fast, well-armored archer with less attack than other archers.

name: Samurai

civb.Japanese: base reload time 1.9, thanks to bonus (-25%) 1.425

note: Japanese unique unit. Infantry with fast attack. Attack bonus vs. other unique units, buildings.

name: Elite Samurai

civb.Japanese: base reload time 1.9, thanks to bonus (-25%) 1.425

note: Japanese elite unique unit. Infantry with fast attack. Attack bonus vs. other unique units, buildings.

name: Tarkan

extra.attack bonus: +10 castle, +8 buildings, +12 stone defense, +8 walls and gates

note: Hun unique unit. Cavalry with attack bonus vs. buildings. (Attack bonuses stack - for example +16 against a palisade wall (8 buildings + 8 walls))

name: Elite Tarkan

extra.attack bonus: +10 castle, +10 buildings, +12 stone defense, +10 walls and gates

note: Hun elite unique unit. Cavalry with attack bonus vs. buildings. (Attack bonuses stack - for example +20 against castles (10+10))

name: Teutonic Knight
note: +4 buildings, +4 eagle warriors

name: Elite Teutonic Knight
note: Teutonic elite unique unit. Infantry with effective armor and slow but powerful attack.

name: Throwing Axeman
note: Frankish unique unit. Infantry with ranged attack.

name: Elite Throwing Axeman
note: Frankish elite unique unit. Infantry with ranged attack

name: War Elephant
note: Persian unique unit. Slow, powerful, strong, and well-armored cavalry. Does trample damage in a surrounding area (see blast radius).

name: Elite War Elephant
note: Persian unique unit. Slow, powerful, strong, and well-armored cavalry. Does trample damage in a surrounding area (see blast radius).

name: War Wagon
note: Korean unique unit. Heavily armored horse-drawn archery unit.

name: Elite War Wagon
note: Korean elite unique unit. Heavily armored horse-drawn archery unit.

name: Woad Raider

extra.base movement rate: 1.2, but because of the celts bonus 1.2*1.15 = 1.38

note: Celtic unique unit. Exceptionally quick infantry. Attack bonus vs. buildings.

name: Elite Woad Raider

extra.base movement rate: 1.2, but because of the celts bonus 1.2*1.15 = 1.38

note: Celtic elite unique unit. Stronger than Woad Raider.

civb.Japanese:
120 HP 0/6 armor (+2 pierce armor);
work rate +5% in Dark, +10% in Feudal, +15% in Castle, +20% in Imperial Age
civb.Persians: 0:36.36 BT in Feudal, 0:34.78 BT in Castle, 0:33.33 BT in Imperial

name: Trade Cog

civb.Persians: 0:32.73 BT in Feudal, 0:31.3 BT in Castle, 0:30 BT in Imperial

note: Movement rate 2.00 with caravan. Carry 30% more gold/distance compared to trade cart.

name: Transport Ship

civb.Persians: 0:40.91 BT in Feudal, 0:39.13 BT in Castle, 0:37.5 BT in Imperial
civb.Saracens: 200 HP, Garrison 10 inside (15 with careening, 25 with dry dock)
civb.Vikings: Cost 106W (-15% bonus) in Feudal/Castle, 100W (-20% bonus) in Imperial age

note: Garrison inside 5 (10 with careening, 20 with dry dock). Can carry herdable animals.

name: Galley

civb.Persians: 0:54.55 BT in Feudal, 0:52.17 BT in Castle, 0:50 BT in Imperial
civb.Vikings: Cost 76W 25G (-15% bonus) in Feudal/Castle, 72W 24G (-20% bonus) in Imperial age

note: Small, fast ship with weak attack. Used to scout the water and for early attacks on enemy fishing fleets.

name: War Galley

civb.Persians: 0:31.3 BT in Castle, 0:30 BT in Imperial
civb.Vikings: Cost 76W 25G (-15% bonus) in Castle, 72W 24G (-20% bonus) in Imperial age

note: Stronger than Galley.

name: Galleon

civb.Vikings: Cost 72W 24G (-20% bonus) in Imperial age

note: +11 ships, 4 ram, 8 buildings

name: Fire Ship

civb.Persians: 0:31.3 BT in Castle, 0:30 BT in Imperial

note: Spews fire at other ships. Good at sinking galleys. Attack shows pierce attack.

name: Fast Fire Ship
note: Spews fire at other ships and fast. Good at sinking galleys. Attack shows pierce attack.

name: Demolition Ship

civb.Persians: 0:26.96 BT in Castle, 0:25.83 BT in Imperial
civb.Vikings: Cost 60W 43G (-15% bonus) in Castle, 56W 40G (-20% bonus) in Imperial Age

note: Filled with explosives. Self-destructs when used. Pilot near enemy ships and detonate to wrest control of the sea from an entrenched opponent.

name: Heavy Demolition Ship

civb.Vikings: Cost 56W 40G (-20% cost bonus)

note: Filled with explosives. Self-destructs when used. Pilot near enemy ships and detonate to wrest control of the sea from an entrenched opponent.

name: Cannon Galleon

civb.Vikings: Cost 160W 120G (-20% cost bonus)

note: Long-range warship used to attack targets on shore to establish beachhead. Fires slowly, with minimum range.

name: Elite Cannon Galleon

civb.Vikings: Cost 160W 120G (-20% cost bonus)

note: Long-range warship used to attack targets on shore to establish beachhead. Fires slowly, with minimum range.

name: Longboat

extra.reload time: 3, but because of the multiple arrows it get delayed

civb.Vikings: Base cost 100W 50G, but -15% cost bonus in Castle -> 85W 43G and -20% bonus in Imperial -> 80W 40G

note: Viking unique unit. Fires multiple arrows. volley of 4 arrows (7-1-1-1). Because of the multiple arrows, the delay between starts of attacks is roughly 3.34.

name: Elite Longboat

extra.reload time: 3, but because of the multiple arrows it get delayed

civb.Vikings: Base cost 100W 50G, but -20% bonus in Imperial -> 80W 40G

note: Viking elite unique unit. Stronger than Longboat. Fires multiple arrows. volley of 4 arrows (8-1-1-1). Because of the multiple arrows, the delay between starts of attacks is roughly 3.34.

name: Turtle Ship
note: Korean unique unit. Slow, ironclad battleship used to destroy other ships at close range.

name: Elite Turtle Ship
note: Korean elite unique unit. Slow, ironclad battleship used to destroy other ships at close range.

name: Villager

extra.sappers: +15 attack bonus against buildings and stone defenses

civb.Goths: +5 attack vs boar, hunters carry +15 food
civb.Persians: 0:22.73 BT in Feudal, 0:21.74 BT in Castle, 0:20.83 in Imperial Age
civb.Incas: Villagers affected by blacksmith upgrades (melee attack, infantry armor).
civb.Indians:
Cost 45F in Dark, 43F in Feudal, 40F in Castle, 38F in Imperial Age;
fishermen work 15% faster carry +15
civb.Berbers: 0.88 base movement rate (MR), 0.97 MR with wheelbarrow, 1.07 MR with handcart

note: Gathers wood, food, stone, gold. Builds and repairs buildings. Also repairs ships, siege weapons.

name: Monk

civb.Aztecs: -15% military creation bonus doesn't apply in DLCs

note: Slow and weak. Converts enemy units, ships to your civilization (player color). Heals wounded villagers, military units (except siege weapons)

name: Missionary
note: mounted monk, affected by bloodlines

name: Trade Cart

extra.DLCs: Trade Carts in DLCs have a smaller collision radius (less blockages on trade routes).

note: Used to trade with other players by land. Carries goods from your Market to another player's Market and brings back gold. The farther the Market, the higher your profit. To trade, click the Trade Cart, then right-click an allied or neutral Market.

name: Kamayuk
note: Inca unique infantry unit with ranged attack and no projectile.

name: Elite Kamayuk
note: Inca elite unique infantry unit with ranged attack and no projectile.

name: Slinger
note: Only available to Incas. Anti-infantry ranged unit

name: Elephant Archer
note: Indian unique unit, Classified as cavalry archer and all bonuses applied against war elephants apply against them as well.

name: Elite Elephant Archer
note: Indian elite unique unit, Classified as cavalry archer and all bonuses applied against war elephants apply against them as well.

name: Imperial Camel
note: Inly available to Indians. Stronger than Heavy Camel. Attack bonus vs. cavalry. (not classified as cavalry)

name: Genoese Crossbowman
note: Italian slow shooting ranged unique unit with attack bonus against cavalry

name: Elite Genoese Crossbowman
note: Italian ranged elite unique unit with attack bonus against cavalry. Shoots faster than non-elite.

name: Condottiero

extra.armor bonus: +10 anti-infantry armor (only against damage from gunpowder units)

civb.Vikings: 96 HP (get +20% HP bonus in Imperial Age)
civb.Malians: +1 PA/age -> (2 in Feudal, 3 in Castle and 4 in Imperial Age)

note: Anti gunpowder infantry. All Italian allies get this in imperial age.

name: Magyar Huszar
note: Magyar unique unit. Similar to hussar with faster build time, attack bonus against siege.

name: Elite Magyar Huszar
note: Magyar elite unique unit. Similar to hussar with attack bonus against siege.

name: Boyar
note: Slav Unique unit with strong melee armor and attack.

name: Elite Boyar
note: Slav elite Unique unit with strong melee armor and attack.

name: Organ Gun

extra.attack bonus: +1 rams. The additional bullets do 2 damage to any unit (1 if they hit another unit).

civb.Portuguese: Base price 80F 70G, but thanks to portuguese bonus -> 80F 60G

note: Portuguese unique siege unit. Releases 5 projectiles at once affecting a small area.

extra.attack bonus: +1 rams. The additional bullets do 2 damage to any unit (1 if they hit another unit).

civb.Portuguese: Base price 80F 70G, but thanks to portuguese bonus -> 80F 60G

note: Portuguese elite unique siege unit. Releases 5 projectiles at once affecting a small area.

name: Eagle Scout
note: Fast infantry with extensive sight; resists conversion; attack bonus vs. Monks

name: Eagle Scout
note: Fast infantry with extensive sight; resists conversion; attack bonus vs. Monks

extra.attack bonus: +8 vs all buildings, +6 vs ships, +4 vs rams

civb.Portuguese:
Base price 90W 40G, but thanks to portuguese bonus -> 90F 34G
Base HP 130, but thanks to portuguese bonus -> 143 HP

note: Portuguese unique unit. Effective vs large fleets, because each shot damages multiple units in a straight line.

name: Elite Caravel

extra.attack bonus: +9 vs all buildings, +7 vs ships, +4 vs rams

civb.Portuguese:
Base price 90W 40G, but thanks to portuguese bonus -> 90F 34G
Base HP 150, but thanks to portuguese bonus -> 165 HP

name: Shotel Warrior
note: Ethiopian Unique unit. Cheap Infantry unit with high creation speed.

note: Ethiopian elite Unique unit. Cheap Infantry unit with high creation speed.

name: Gbeto
note: Malian unique unit. Quick infantry unit with a high ranged attack.

note: Malian elite unique unit. Quick infantry unit with a high ranged attack.

name: Camel Archer
note: Berber unique unit. Cavalry archer with an attack bonus vs cavalry archers.

name: Elite Camel Archer
note: Berber elite unique unit. Cavalry archer with an attack bonus vs cavalry archers.

note: Siege weapon used to scale enemy walls; resistant to archer attack. Infantry, villagers and foot archer can garrison inside for transportation (max 10 units).

name: Fire Galley

note: Spews fire at other ships. Good at sinking galleys. Attack shows pierce attack.

civb.Vikings: Cost 60W 43G in Feudal/Castle (-15% cost bonus), 56W 40G in Imperial (-20% cost bonus)

civb.Huns with Berber ally: Costs 32W 45F in Castle age (-10% bonus), 28W 40F in Imperial(-20% bonus)

civb.Byzantine with Berber ally: Genitour classified as cavalry archer, not as skirm, so no bonus

name: Arambai
note: Burmese unique unit. Mounted dart thrower. Classified as a conquistador type (only archer armor upgrades apply from blacksmith, not range or attack). All bonuses against archers, cavalry archers, cavalry applies to them as well.

note: Burmese unique unit. Stronger than Arambai. Classified as a conquistador type (only archer armor upgrades apply from blacksmith, not range or attack). All bonuses against archers, cavalry archers, cavalry applies to them as well.

extra.attack bonus: +3 standard buildings, +3 stone defense, +2 all buildings, +8 ships, +100 trees

name: Elite Ballista Elephant
